attributes.action: make walking to school in Beaconsfield (Buckinghamshire) safer for us all!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On 18.1.10 Richard Power (41) was knocked over by a car on the zebra
crossing alongside 3-5 London End.
There are regular near misses here. The crossing is too close to the roundabout and vehicles parked on the pavement obstruct good views of pedestrians trying to cross. This is particularly an issue for children and the elderly.

The other particularly dangerous point en route is Wattleton Road which has 3 schools located on it - Butlers Court Primary, The Beaconsfield School and Beaconsfield High School. There is no safe crossing.
